name: 2D Space Blaster!
description:
2D Shooter project.

Modifications:

  1.  Engaging levels with ranging difficulties from Easy to Hard
  2. Implemented use of asteroids in the form of damaging obstacles forcing a more strategic playing experience
  3.  Fully detailed instructions manual on the main menu to help out beginners
  4. Retry buttons on every level on a game over screen
  5. Gave enemy spawners a unique sprite

By Katie R
